title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing sand in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing pebbles in a dream for a man, and pebbles in a dream indicate a lot of money because it shows strength of character and the ability to endure hardships and bear responsibilities, but seeing the sky raining is not a good thing and shows the adversities and obstacles that the dreamer faces. Interpretation of a dream about seeing slip into a dream and the symbol of pebbles in a single woman’s dream Married and pregnant women, and in a man’s dream, the interpretation of a dream about seeing pebbles in a dream for a man. Slander indicates cruelty, distress, and bad friends, as it may mean obtaining money. Interpretation of a dream about slipping in a dream: The interpretation of seeing pebbles in a dream is undesirable, because it shows many fears. It makes the dreamer sad. Around him and expose him to a lot of the harshness of life. Dreaming about rocks is a sign that you will get a lot of money and this could be a financial benefit soon. Seeing the sky raining pebbles in a dream, this indicates many difficulties. Obstacles and challenges that the dreamer faces in his life. Therefore, The dream in which you see someone walking on pebbles in a dream indicates failure, feelings of despair, disappointment, and exposure to many material losses. Seeing yourself throwing pebbles in a dream is a sign of cruelty in dealing with others and speaking badly and unfairly. Read also: Interpretation of dreams To see cement in a dream. Interpretation of seeing rocks for an unmarried woman: Interpretation of a dream about a rock and flying in a dream for a single woman. This indicates that she is a girl with a strong personality and needs a lot of care when dealing with others. Seeing a group of rocks in a dream for an unmarried woman means staying away from Satan. By reading the Holy Qur’an, persevering, and seeking God’s help. Dreaming of an unmarried girl who was accidentally thrown away by someone in a dream is evidence of hypocrites and those who hate her and claim to love her. Dreaming of pebbles in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates that she is committing many immoral behaviors and needs to repent and stop. The dream in which you see stones in a single woman’s dream indicates that she will get what she wants and aspires to without making any effort. Interpretation of a married woman’s dream: The interpretation of seeing pebbles in a dream for a married woman is evidence of the extension of nourishment and kindness. The abundance of money and blessing in it and the increase in the number of onlookers. A large stumble in a married woman’s dream indicates that there is a lot of money through inheritance in the coming period. Seeing a married woman walking on pebbles in a dream indicates that she is living with her husband in many problems that cause sadness. Seeing pebbles and bricks in a married woman’s dream Evidence that she is trying to support her family, take care of her husband, and take care of her children. Also follow: Interpretation of a dream about seeing sand in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of seeing a torso for a pregnant woman: Seeing a white slip in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates that she will give birth to a beautiful female and it will be the source of her happiness after giving birth. Throwing it with sand indicates the misery and hardships of childbirth. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing mud in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and others.

title: I dreamed that I was giving birth and I was not pregnant

preview.html: I dreamed that I was giving birth while I was not pregnant. It is considered one of the strange dreams that carry many different interpretations and meanings, as the interpretation of this dream varies from one person to another depending on the situation and the details of the vision within the dream. The dream of giving birth is considered among the common dreams among women and girls in general, and through our article We will learn about the interpretation of this vision in detail through the interpretation. I dreamed that I was giving birth and I was not pregnant in a dream. Interpretation of a dream that I was giving birth and I was not pregnant. This dream is considered one of the common dreams, as there is a constant curiosity for the dreamer to search and know the interpretation of this dream. In the following points we will explain the interpretation of this dream. I dreamed that I was giving birth while I was I was not pregnant in a dream: Seeing childbirth without pregnancy for an unmarried and unmarried girl suggests that she will face many problems in the coming days, but she will get rid of them soon, God willing. Seeing childbirth in a dream indicates many worries, problems, and the dreamer’s bad psychology and that he is in need. Desperate for help. If a married woman sees herself giving birth to a male child without becoming pregnant, this indicates that she will be exposed to marital problems between her and her husband. However, if an unmarried girl sees that she is giving birth to a male child in her dream, this indicates the loss of dreams and desires and that she will be exposed to despair and disappointment. In her life. If a divorced woman sees in her dream that she has given birth to a male child from her ex-husband, this means that she cannot get rid of the past and that she is suffering from crises and psychological exhaustion after separating from her ex-husband. - Husband. See also: I dreamed that I had a miscarriage during pregnancy. Interpretation of dreams about miscarriage in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream that I was giving birth and I was not pregnant for a single woman. This vision has many different meanings, as the interpretation of this vision varies according to the events that occur in the vision, and after that we will explain the interpretation of this vision. I dreamed that I was giving birth while I was not pregnant. If An unmarried girl saw in her dream that she gave birth to a male child and felt miserable because of that. This means that she will be exposed to many crises in the coming period. If an unmarried girl sees that she has given birth to a handsome boy and is happy to see her, this indicates the date of her approaching marriage with the person she loves and the person The one she wants to marry. As for her seeing this dream and being afraid of her family, this indicates that this dreamer is doing wrong actions and things and she is afraid that one of her family will know about her, so she must be careful and stop such actions. For an unmarried girl to dream of giving birth to a boy means that she will go through problems and crises at her work, and this will cause her sadness and exhaustion. It is possible that seeing the birth of an unmarried girl in her dream indicates that she will obtain a senior position at work and be promoted in the coming days and will achieve her dreams and ambitions. As for the girl An unmarried woman who sees in her dream that she is giving birth to twins from a vision, this indicates that the unmarried girl will face problems with the one she loves and a separation may occur. See also: I dreamed that I was flying without wings, interpretation of a dream about flying in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of dreams that I was giving birth

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a father’s death in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing the death of one’s father in a dream by Ibn Sirin is one of the visions that express the difficulties, pain, and anguish that the dreamer is going through. Seeing his death in a dream is disturbing and disturbing. The death of a father is a slow death for children as well. There is no doubt that the death of a father is a loss for the children, and it is a vision that is not sad or disturbing. But also evil in the world of dreams. Perhaps this means that we are necessary in our lives and indicates the loss of kindness, love, understanding, security, the spread of diseases, hatred, war and hostility. We will now mention what was said about the interpretation of this vision by interpreters and experienced interpreters to interpret various circumstances and people. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the death of the father in... Ibn Sirin’s dream. Interpretation of seeing the death of his father according to Ibn Sirin and its meaning: Among the scholars who spoke a lot about this dream is that Ibn Sirin interpreted the meaning of the dream of seeing the death of his father while he was alive and not dead. If a person sees the death of his father in a dream and mourns his death or cries over him, then this It means that the dreamer will go through a state of weakness and extreme weakness for a non-trivial period, but it will disappear just like that. - Seeing the death of a father in a dream indicates that the dreamer enters a state of despair and weakness in making the right decision for a period and then disappears from this state after a while. Whoever is a young child and sees a vision of his father’s death, this is evidence of his love for her. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing his father’s death in A dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s vision of the father’s death for an unmarried woman and its meaning: Ibn Sirin said that seeing the father’s death in her dream indicates goodness, happiness and blessing. The death of the father in one dream has a positive initial meaning and indicates life and a new status for the father and good news for the girl will make her father happy. Perhaps This is if a girl sees the death of her father, this indicates her bad feeling due to the deterioration of her health. Seeing the father of an unmarried woman in a dream and his death means livelihood or prosperity. The death of a father in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates the disappearance of obedience and loyalty and the transfer of guardianship and obedience to her husband, i.e. a sign of marriage. Continue also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing the death of a son or daughter in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing the death of the father according to Ibn Sirin for a married woman and its meaning: Ibn Shirin said: Seeing the death of the father for a married woman is evidence that her father planted a good farm for his daughter and that she was good and blessed. And proof of good offspring, blessings and great livelihood. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing his father’s death for a man and its meaning: A man who sees his father’s death indicates disagreement and enmity between him and his father in a dream. If a man dreams that his father is preparing to travel and he dies and his travel bags are with him, his travel bags will be a sign of the deterioration of his father’s health in reality. If he is alive. But if his father has already died, this indicates kindness to the person. And that his father was pleased with him before his death, and that goodness and blessings be upon him. If a man sees that he advises his father in his dream and his collapse, and causes him psychological pain that leads to his death And not to bear with him in this quarrel. This indicates that the vision in reality will regret his negligence towards his father and those close to him, and even himself, and that he needs to review his account well and repair his relationship with those who...

title: Interpretation of seeing space and planets in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing space and planets in a single girl’s dream: If an unmarried girl sees in a dream space, planets, and stars. This dream indicates that this single girl will succeed and excel in her studies. Also, if a girl sees this dream in her dream. Of course, this indicates that this single girl She will soon marry a man who is good, reliable, and loyal to his religion. Likewise, if a girl sees in her dream a planet that radiates light and shines. This dream indicates that this dreaming girl will be happy and fulfilled and that she will also see a lot of happiness in her life. Also, if an unmarried girl sees space And the planets in a dream. This is definitely evidence that the fears and problems that this single girl is suffering from will go away. Also, the dreaming girl will do good deeds, and God Almighty is over everything. Interpretation of seeing space and planets in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees space planets and sparkling stars in her dream. This dream indicates that this married woman will see happiness in her life. This dream also indicates that this married woman will move from one place to another and will also move to new places. Also, if a married woman sees the flower in her dream. This dream indicates that her husband This married woman will join a new and prestigious job. This dream also indicates that this married woman will give birth to a beautiful child with a beautiful face. Also, if the married woman dreams that she sees planets, space, and stars in a dream. This dream indicates that the married woman will win the battles that he will win. Her husband in the near future. It is also when a married woman sees Mars in a dream. This dream indicates that this dreaming lady will fall into many worries and problems. This dream also indicates that the husband of this dreaming lady will fall into distress, and will be imprisoned, and God is Most High. And I know. We have chosen for you: Interpretation of seeing the sun in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing space and planets in a pregnant woman’s dream. If a pregnant woman sees space and planets in her dream and they land in their room. This dream indicates that her date of birth has been determined and that her birth process will be easy, God willing. If The pregnant woman dreamed that she saw many stars in her dream. This dream indicates that the fears and problems that this dreaming woman is suffering from will disappear. It also indicates that the pregnant woman will give birth to a child who is healthy and free of diseases. See also: Interpretation of seeing the moon in A dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq: Seeing Saturn in a man’s dream: If one person sees the planet Saturn in a dream, or sees space, planets, and stars. This dream showed that this dreamer will reach a high position, and God knows best. Also, if one man sees the sparkling stars in his sleep. This dream indicated Until the fears and problems of this single person will go away. This dream also indicates that this dreamer will get married soon. This marriage will be a blessed marriage because he will marry a good girl. Also, if an unmarried person sees in a dream that the planets are falling from the sky. This dream indicates that H

title: Interpretation of a dream about marrying an ugly woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about marrying an ugly woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Dreams are very important to many people. They gave space of their time to interpret their dreams, but Islamic law limited its position to dreams and considered many of them to be mere fantasies. As for the correct visions, God Almighty sends them to His true servants to preach and warn, and among them are the pipes of devils that do not afflict anyone, and in this article we provide the interpretation of a dream about marrying a man. An ugly woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about marrying an ugly woman in a dream: Usually men marry a woman with an attractive appearance, but what does the dream mean about marrying an ugly woman, so we explain in these points the interpretation of a dream about marrying an ugly woman in a dream: The dream indicates Marrying an ugly woman indicates that this man is suffering from poverty and worries. Sometimes it indicates financial hardship. His dream of marrying an ugly woman may mean that he is exposed to many tribulations, magic, and desires that he sees in his life. Moreover, it indicates that you are facing many Of problems and issues in life and not fulfilling desires and dreams. See also: Interpretation of a dream about swimming in the sea for unmarried and divorced women and men. Interpretation of the appearance of an ugly woman in one dream. Seeing an ugly woman in an unmarried person’s dream indicates anxiety and a feeling of insecurity that an unmarried girl suffers from. We continue to interpret the appearance of an ugly woman in a single man’s dream at these points: Seeing an ugly woman in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates the state of misery and despair that the girl is going through. As for the appearance of an ugly woman in an unmarried woman’s dream, this indicates that the unmarried girl She is trying to get rid of the bad habits that she is experiencing. A feeling of remorse may be the reason for her wrong actions. Sometimes this is explained by the psychological state she is experiencing and the feeling of hatred towards others. Hitting an unmarried woman indicates her attempt to get rid of the wrong behaviors of this girl. In the event of death An ugly woman, it portends the removal of the danger to which the girl was exposed. See also: Interpretation of dreams of seeing a stabbing knife in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, and a man according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the appearance of an ugly woman in a married dream. A married woman can go through many changes that affect her personal life and her family, especially When financial difficulties arise, and this of course is reflected in her dreams, in these points we explain the interpretation of the appearance of an ugly woman in a married dream: The dream of an ugly woman in a married woman’s dream indicates the feelings of hatred and jealousy that she carries in a kiss towards others. The appearance of an ugly woman in a married dream symbolizes The state of boredom and anguish that a person goes through, as well as the negative feelings that constantly haunt her mind. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing milk in a dream for a single woman and a married woman in Ibn Sirin and Nablus. Interpretation of the appearance of an ugly woman in a pregnant woman’s dream. Seeing a pregnant woman in her dream, an ugly woman, can Refers to suffering

title: I dreamed that my boss was giving me money in a dream about being single and marrying Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I dreamed that my boss gave me money in a dream according to Ibn Sirinut. Interpretations of dreams are among the things that have drawn the attention of scholars to them due to their strangeness and the ambiguity of the interpretations that revolve around them. My boss gave me money in a dream to Ibn Shirin. I dreamed that my boss gave me money in a dream to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of dreams is a wide world of information and details that refer to every phrase and every dream in our dreams, and the interpreter must be aware of everything, and now we will show you a dream that my boss gives me money In a dream. Ibn Sirin: If a man sees in a dream that his manager gave him money in a dream, this is a sign that something good will happen. In the event that the manager gives the fortuneteller a banknote in the dream, this is evidence of the promotion that the dreamer will receive and that there is a lot of sustenance on the way for the person Also, if the dreamer sees in a dream his manager giving him coins, this is a sign of failure, and problems that he will face in his work. But if an unmarried girl dreams that her manager is giving her money, this is a sign that the manager will marry her. We mentioned these details in our topic. I dreamed that my boss was giving me money in a dream by Ibn Sirin. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a naked mother in a dream for a single woman married to Ibn Sirin. In the event that a person sees in a dream that his father gives him money in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer needs tenderness and sympathy from the father. In the event that a person takes money from his deceased father, this indicates that the dreamer has an urgent desire within the person. To see his father. But if one sees in a dream that he gets his money from his father, it means that his father takes care of the dreamer. In the event that there is a person who suffered from a bad financial situation and in his dream he received money from his father, this is a sign of almost material comfort, God willing. We mentioned these interpretations in our topic that I dreamed that my boss was giving me money in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. title: What did Ibn Sirin say when he saw killing a snake in a dream?

preview.html: Killing a snake in a dream is one of the dreams that brings together many interpretations and hints. The dream is usually a reflection of the dreamer’s troubled psychology and because of the number of problems he is currently facing. Today, through the Asrar Dream Interpretation website, we will discuss together your interpretation in detail. Killing a snake in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of killing a snake in a dream is an indication However, the person with the vision is going through many difficulties in his life and is helpless and unable to confront them, but killing him suggests getting rid of them. they. Ibn Shaheen showed that the vision brings goodness to the individual by getting rid of an evil close to him in his life and restoring comfort and security again. Interpreters say that killing a snake in a dream is a sign of overcoming the financial crisis that the dreamer is going through and in general his material affairs will improve, and he will be able to reveal About his truth and peace will prevail in his life. Anyone who feels disappointed in the current period and expects many bad things to happen to him, the dream tells him that dark thoughts are dominating his head, and God Almighty everything will improve, and success will become an ally in life. Killing a snake in a dream means that many... Important things will happen to the dreamer, and in general the dream is a good message. Killing a snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin confirmed that killing a snake in a dream is one of the visions that brings goodness to its owner, and that killing a snake in a dream is good news for getting rid of distress and his death, and it is the closest to relief and comfort. The complete removal of evil from the dreamer’s life. Whoever was worried and afraid of something, the dream shows that there is no need to worry at all because it is in the beginning and end of God alone. Killing a snake in a young suitor’s dream indicates that this engagement will be canceled in the coming days because he did not find any benefit in it, But all the time she was causing him problems with those around him. Something controversial or suspicious will bring him trouble. Killing a snake in a dream for an unmarried womanKilling a snake in a dream means that success will be in harmony with the dreamer’s life and it will be very easy for her to achieve any of the goals and ambitions she desires throughout her life. Killing a snake in a dream indicates the presence of a girlfriend A traitor is next to the dreamer all the time and shows her that she is her close friend, although she manages problems and destroys her life, but she will be able to reveal her truth soon. Killing a snake in a dream for a married womanKilling a snake in a dream for a married woman is good news. The coming period will bring a lot of happy news to the dreamer. If she is experiencing a crisis or some problem in her life, the dream is good news that she will get out of it soon. A snake in a married dream reflects the presence of a fierce enemy in her life, and killing him means getting rid of this enemy. If a married woman sees herself killing a snake in her bed, this means that she will end her relationship with a person close to her who enters her home, but she will discover that he is a toxic person working to create problems between her. And he has her husband. Anyone who dreams that her husband kills a large snake indicates that the husband will go through many financial problems, but he will be able to overcome them and then enter into a deal...

title: Interpretation of seeing a deer in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a deer by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin’s explanation of seeing a deer in a dream indicates happiness and joy that will dominate the dreamer. Whoever sees this in his dream: a deer running away from it, this indicates the presence of an opportunity in the life of the dreamer, and he missed it. Seeing a dead deer in a dream shows a false and ended friendship. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin Seeing a dead deer in a dream will be a sign of failure in life. As for someone who dreams that he is killing a deer, this indicates separation from the one he loves. And whoever sees a merchant’s deer in a dream, this is a sign that he will lose his money and go bankrupt. Killing a deer in a dream is a sign of the betrayal and treachery of friends. Interpretation of seeing a deer in a dream for a single woman: A deer in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates her lover. If she dreams that she is running after him, chasing the deer, and getting it in the end, then this is a sign of her marriage to her lover, but if the deer escapes from her inside. A dream is a sign that she will not marry him. Commentators explained that seeing a deer in a dream for a single woman indicates her purity, honor, and good luck in marriage. Whoever sees in her dream that she is dripping with the blood of a deer indicates the money that will come to her. Eating deer meat in a dream for an unmarried woman is a sign of kindness and kindness. From the bite of food. And if she sees in her sleep, deer antlers, this shows your strength. Interpretation of seeing a deer for a married woman. A married woman who sees a deer in a dream indicates her good luck. And if she sees a dead deer in a dream, this indicates her instability, lack of peace of mind, and loneliness. The eyes of a deer in A dream for a married woman, this indicates the sadness and anxiety that she is experiencing. If a married woman dreams that she is eating a deer, this indicates the betrayal and treachery that she will experience in her life. Deer blood for a married woman. It indicates the pain and suffering that the woman is suffering from. Interpretation of seeing a deer for a pregnant womanPregnant woman Whoever sees a deer in a dream indicates her pregnancy, and if the deer is beautiful in appearance, this indicates that God will bless her with a very beautiful child. There is another interpretation about seeing a deer in a dream for a pregnant woman, as it is a sign of easy childbirth. If he sees a stray deer in a dream, this indicates the suffering that The woman will suffer from it during childbirth. Therefore, we have provided you with all possible interpretations of seeing a deer in a dream. Anyone who has a vision and wants to interpret it, we receive your feedback through the site and we will give you the interpretation as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of seeing parsley in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing parsley in a dream. Parsley is a leafy vegetable and has many benefits, as it is characterized by its distinctive taste and gives foods a delicious taste and aroma. Good luck, a good life, and a young man to find a prestigious job. Seeing wilted parsley indicates illness. Interpretation of a dream about green parsley for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is eating green parsley, this means that she has obtained a high academic qualification and a prominent position in science or work. Also It is evidence of the imminent date of the girl’s marriage to a young man of position, money, and status, and this young man has good morals and a good reputation. Evidence of achievement and success in practical or academic life if she is a student. Interpretation of a dream about parsley and coriander in a dream. Seeing coriander and parsley in a dream indicates the high status of the fortuneteller. And the fulfillment of many desires and continued success. If a girl sees this, this means a new stage in her life and the achievement of her goals in life, and this vision for a young man also indicates that he will join a prestigious job. Seeing parsley for a married woman indicates the stability of her married life and the enjoyment of good health. Parsley in a dream for a woman Absolutely: Seeing parsley in an ideal dream indicates the loss of worry and anxiety and freedom from troubles and problems. Seeing parsley or eating parsley also means obtaining a prestigious job or obtaining money and improving financial conditions. Interpretation of seeing parsley in a dream for a single woman: Seeing cut parsley in a dream is one of the good visions that It indicates the fulfillment of dreams and desires, and we wish you success. Also, the vision of chopping parsley for unmarried women indicates good visions that indicate the end of worry, worry, and semi-comfort. The vision of chopping parsley indicates freedom from fatigue and pain, profitable trade, and the famous position of the pioneer. Interpretation of a dream about buying green parsley for a married womanBuy Parsley is a good vision that indicates good luck, happiness and stability in married life if the parsley is green. Seeing wilted and yellow parsley indicates exhaustion, suffering and illness, in addition to difficulties in the dreamer’s life and many problems. Giving parsley in a dream Seeing parsley indicates a safe and stable life for individuals, as well as About the abundance of money and halal livelihood. Giving parsley indicates the fulfillment of desires and a good life. A single woman eating parsley in her dream indicates positive changes in her life. Fresh green parsley alone indicates recovery from illness. A girl buying parsley from the market indicates her engagement is approaching. Interpretation A dead person asking for parsley: Seeing someone offering parsley means that you will hear good news. If one sees that a dead person is asking for parsley, this indicates new changes in the dreamer’s life and a change in his life for the better, as it indicates the end of worry and worry. Seeing parsley withering indicates fatigue and illness. It also Evidence of many problems and fears, and evidence that the dreamer is exposed to material losses and many fears and quarrels. Giving parsley in a dreamParsley

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing wine in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing wine in a dream according to Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen. Seeing wine is one of the dreams that may represent money and prestige, and seeing drinking wine indicates profit from prohibition. Many people drink wine, and wine is an alcoholic beverage known as ethanol and is usually made from some foods such as strawberries and grapes. Follow us. Dreaming of seeing wine on the authority of Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin indicated in his interpretation of seeing wine in a dream to tension and sadness. Perhaps money is forbidden without effort or difficulty in obtaining it. Accordingly, it is forbidden in the Islamic religion. Whoever sees in his dream that he is drinking wine and drunkenness, after drinking in the dream indicates that the dreamer has great wealth, but he remains in blessings. Having money and sugar in a dream also indicates money and power. But if The dreamer saw that he was drunk in his dream without drinking, then his vision shows that he is afraid of something, and the vision that he drank in his dream without drinking shows goodness and the end of his fear. As for whoever thinks that he is drunk, his vision announces that he is called something other than what he is, or what does not belong to him. As for whoever sees in his dream that he is drinking alcohol, seeing him is forbidden from doing so. As for whoever dreams of a person struggling in his dream to drink alcohol, his vision indicates bad luck and enmity. Whoever sees in his dream that he is drinking alcohol as if he is resisting someone, then his vision indicates that his opponent It will increase his vision. Drinking wine in a dream also indicates the loss of a loved one, such as his son or daughter. Drinking wine in a dream also indicates that the dreamer will become amnesiac and perhaps paranoid when wine comes to mind. As for the one who sees in his dream that he is drinking Al-Nabulsi will interpret the dream of seeing wine in a dream as a forbidden and great sin. Whoever sees in his dream that he is drinking alcohol, his vision indicates that he will suffer a great sin. He dreams of seeing wine on the authority of Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen went on to explain the vision of drinking alcohol in a dream, which indicates that money is forbidden. Whoever sees in his dream that he is drinking alcohol, his vision indicates that the dreamer indicates that money is forbidden, no matter how much alcohol he drinks. Dream of seeing wine for a single woman who It is clear that alcohol or drinking is very important in her life, which reflects her reality. Seeing wine in a dream is a sign that she will be good and blessed in her life. The interpretation of a single person drinking alcohol in a dream indicates that he will get married soon. Seeing unmarried women drinking alcohol in a dream means a close marriage. She will be happy in her life. Seeing an unmarried woman drinking alcohol and introducing her to her engagement and not expressing her opinion in this dream is evidence of her satisfaction with that man. As for seeing drunkenness in a dream with a girl who does not deserve praise, this indicates her weakness. Dream of seeing alcohol for a married woman. A married woman sees or drinks Wine in her dream. It contains many indications, both for her and her family. Seeing a married woman who drank wine and drinks because of this drink is undesirable. Because it indicates that she does not know what surrounds her. Because it is evidence of the disintegration of A
